briefTitle: Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Tamsulosin in Children With Neurogenic Bladder
officialTitle: A Phase IIb/III, Multi-centre, Double-blind, Randomised, Placebo-controlled, Dose Ranging Study of Tamsulosin Hydrochloride (Low, Medium and High Dose) as Treatment in Children With Neuropathic Bladder for Three Months
summary: Aim of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of a range of doses of tamsulosin hydrochloride as treatment in children with an elevated detrusor leak point pressure associated with a known neurological deficit

primaryOutcome.measure: Response to Treatment Defined as Patients Who Decrease Their Detrusor Leak Point Pressure (LPP) to <40 cm H2O Based Upon Two Evaluations on the Same Day.

pValues.comp: OG000 vs OG001 vs OG002 vs OG003
